user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
last_action: click on the app icon for Lyft located at the upper left.
reflect_result: By clicking on the Lyft app icon located at the upper left, I am now directed to the app's page on the Google Play Store. This is a necessary step because, from here, I can install the "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit" app by tapping the "Install" button. This action brings us closer to fulfilling the user request to install the Lyft app.
